name: VictorsFood
tag_list: team-building, team-building-cooking-experiences, cooking, cooking-classes, team-development, corporate-wellness, interactive-activity
overview:
VictorsFood creates memorable, interactive team building, cooking parties, cooking classes, corporate events, international food tours , Australian regional food tours and market tours so people learn, have fun and eat well.

They also offer professional services in food consulting, training, food coaching, demonstrations and presentations.

Hands on cooking throughout their team building events and cooking classes brings food and fun to the people.

VictorsFood tailor solutions to meet client requirements and are totally mobile, so whilst based in Sydney they often tour Australia to conduct client focused team building events.

A professional and organised team headed by Victor Pisapia, who brings to the table, success in the food industry since 1976 with 6 restaurants under his belt, professional teaching qualifications and experience, and a passion for food. He loves to deliver the message: â€œcooking is for everyone.â€

He is especially keen on team building in the corporate market, as he believes food connects people and is a powerful medium for relationship building. â€œWorking in a â€˜corporationâ€™ used to be very impersonal, now business is starting to understand that staff engagement and wellness are key to better profits,â€ Victor says. â€œWe help them achieve this through food; we teach staff how to cook from the basics, so they eat better. This really sticks, because we do it in a way that is fun and gets them bonding with each other.â€

Testimonial: The event was so successful and the feed back has been amazing. Thank you for the part you played, for inspiring so many people to embrace healthy cooking and of course for introducing them to the fabulous quinoa!

â€” Jenni Anderson, Event Manager, Impact Communications / Coca Cola event
